name: Cofagrigus
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: They pretend to be elaborate coffins to teach lessons to grave robbers. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.

abilities.name: Durable Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
